attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To have a more fair assement on business
rates for small companys who do not employ ,only work on there on . not by size of premises, at the rate it is going there will not be any small businesses left.

rejection.details: The title must be a call for action and not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
